body:
@apaszke Since it always copies `data`, shouldn't it just copy to the specified device? I can't really understand why this might be expected. Why does it even use the `data`'s device when a `device` arg is explicitly given? 

You also wrote 
> All parameters are set to user defined defaults, unless overriden.

Here the `device` is explicitly overridden.
